title: Sample DIH Service
description: Provision of insights and trend on markets to companies to stimulate their internal innovation.

type.description: Property. NGSI entity type. It has to be DigitalInnovationHubService

serviceImage.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/URL'. URL of the image of the Digital Innovation Hub Service.

category.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Category of the Digital Innovation Hub Service.

serviceType.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. ServiceType of the Digital Innovation Hub Service.

serviceSubType.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. ServiceSubType of the Digital Innovation Hub Service.

target.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Targets of the Digital Innovation Hub Service.

url.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/URL'. URL of the Digital Innovation Hub Service.

additionalMaterial.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/StructuredValue'. Additional Materials of the Digital Innovation Hub.

contacts.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/StructuredValue'. Contacts of the Digital Innovation Hub.

author.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Author of the Digital Innovation Hub Service.

relation.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/StructuredValue'. Relations of the Digital Innovation Hub Service.

dateSubmitted.description: Property. The date and time of this observation in ISO8601 UTC format. Model:'https://schema.org/DateTime'

dateUpdated.description: Property. The date and time of this observation in ISO8601 UTC format. Model:'https://schema.org/DateTime'
